title: Peanut Butter Fudge Creme Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Good lord -- Nabisco has split Oreo cookies and dunked them in fudge! It's the Oreo Oration review of the Peanut Butter Fudge Creme Oreo Cookie.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to an Oreo Oration I'm Greg Miller and while you are out living your life driving fancy cars seeing movies the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations to Milk's Favorite Cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories now if you like that like this video then subscribe to my Channel today we're reviewing Peanut Butter Fudge Creme yeah that happened this is a real cookie ladies and gentlemen I know up until now we've done some different flavors some different creams some different golden kinds of cookies yeah Oreo's gone Bonkers they've gone freaking insane and they've started fudge covering half Oreos now of course I'm sorry Oreo the way the show begins is the first look which begins with the patented Nabisco seal technology you tear it open no now now we got our first look at how the cookies came out now Oreo Nabisco you know I love you what what is this this

look which begins with the patented Nabisco seal technology you tear it open no now now we got our first look at how the cookies came out now Oreo Nabisco you know I love you what what is this this is just like it's like a bus ran off a cliff and everybody's inside's okay all the children are okay they're going back to school but they're just tossed all over each other they don't know there's like there's fanny packs everywhere pencil cases you're failing bad at the first look I'll tell you what I do notice right away though part of the first look of course is the bouquet of the cookie overpowering you got the peanut butter smell coming at you right now uh next part of course is the Taste we'll take this one which is just on top of all the other ones he doesn't know what he's up against we'll see how it tastes yeah okay I like what you're working with presentation issues aside well done Oreo all right uh you've got the thin cookie layer I'll give you I'll give you the snapshot here

We'll see how it tastes, yeah. Okay, I like what you're working with, presentation issues aside, well done, Oreo. All right, uh, you've got the thin cookie layer, I'll give you that, a snapshot here of the side, the thin cookie layer, then a big old dollop of whatever peanut butter they're using covered there in the fudge. It's a trip, man, it's a trip. I'll tell you right now, oh yeah, the cookie itself gets lost in it. You're definitely tasting the peanut butter right off the bat and mixes with the chocolate. I mean everybody knows chocolate and peanut butter go together. There's another candy cookie out there that I won't mention, it talks about this stuff a lot, but I like what I'm getting here. Sorry, I'm getting Misty, this is a good cookie. We've made a good find here. I didn't know what I was getting into with the fudge cream now. but the fudge on top of the peanut butter is a really good mix it's what you want it's on the go it didn't get my hands too filthy made my teeth pretty bad doesn't dunk well can't be twisted I can't hold it against it it's what Oreo is trying to do here they're moving into the next Millennium as they say so that's the way the cookie Crumbles for the peanut butter Oreo fudge creme but what do you think leave your review as a video response below like the video and then subscribe to my channel here's the most important thing ladies and gentlemen are there Oreos out there that I'm missing please leave the Oreos that you see in your neck of the woods as a comment below then share the video with your friends then of course like it keep going subscribe on Twitter All That Jazz I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking unless the fudge creme does not allow you to dunk at all oh
